"Creating the ★15 Lightstream Xion Weapo:
"If you bring one of the ★13 \"Profound Xion\" weapon series to Zieg and upgrade it multiple times, it will eventually become the ★15 \"Lightstream Xion\" series.

■How to upgrade to the ★14 \"Celestial Xion\" series

In addition to the ★13 \"Profound Xion\" weapon that you want to upgrade at +35, you will need the other target ★13 weapon series, as well as 150 \"Rare-grain Erebos Stone\", which drop in the quest \"Specter of Destruction\"."

"■The other target ★13 weapon series

You will need one weapon from each of the below ★13 weapon series, which mainly drop from Omega Falz bosses.

・\"Detonation\" series at +35
・\"Clawdem\" series at +35
・\"Allure\" series at +35
・\"Chalyra\" series at +35

※The weapon types you use do not have to match."

"■How to upgrade to the ★15 \"Lightstream Xion\" series

In addition to the ★14 \"Celestial Xion\" weapon that you want to upgrade at +35, you will need the item \"Circular Amphitrite Stone\", as well as 400 Excubes.

※Circular Amphitrite Stone can also be obtained as a reward from the title \"One Who Eradicated The Specter\".

※Bear in mind while you can change Lightstream weapons from one type to another, Takts are an exception. Takts do not have special abilities or an attribute, so they cannot be changed into any other type of weapon."
